channel.title: tractionedge on The Skreegs
channel.description: Recent content in tractionedge on The Skreegs

item.title: Language Indecision
item.description: I feel like moving back to Love2d and Lua. Nothing wrong with Python as such and I still prefer that over Lua but the pysdl2 has some issues. Let’s do a procon. Python/PySDL Cons; It’s relatively low level. Even to do something as simple as scaling or rotating forces you to dive down into SDL itself. No community. The pygame community doesn’t count. SDL docs are terrible. Really. Nowhere near as feature rich as Love2d.
